```{r Bdhn1a}

Bdhn1a <- read_excel("Bdhn1a_D_W_v3.xlsx")

# Plot in pdf

pdf("Bdhn1a_D_W_v3.pdf")

ggplot(data = Bdhn1a, aes(x=Treatment, y=TPM)) + geom_boxplot(aes(fill=Treatment)) + ggtitle("Bdhn1a") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
  geom_signif(test="wilcox.test", comparisons = list(c("W","D")), y_position = c(1500), map_signif_level=TRUE)

dev.off()

```

```{r All_Bdhn_D_W}

# Load data

Bdhn1a <- read_excel("Bdhn1a_D_W_v3.xlsx")
Bdhn2 <- read_excel("Bdhn2_D_W_v3.xlsx")
Bdhn3 <- read_excel("Bdhn3_D_W_v3.xlsx")
Bdhn7 <- read_excel("Bdhn7_D_W_v3.xlsx")

# Plot in png

png("All_Bdhn_D_W_v3.png", width=600, height=600)

Bdhn1a_D_W <- ggplot(data = Bdhn1a, aes(x=Treatment, y=TPM)) + geom_boxplot(aes(fill=Treatment)) + ggtitle("Bdhn1a") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
  geom_signif(test="wilcox.test", comparisons = list(c("W","D")), y_position = c(1500), map_signif_level=TRUE)

Bdhn2_D_W <- ggplot(data = Bdhn2, aes(x=Treatment, y=TPM)) + geom_boxplot(aes(fill=Treatment)) + ggtitle("Bdhn2") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
  geom_signif(test="wilcox.test", comparisons = list(c("W","D")), y_position = c(2100), map_signif_level=TRUE)

Bdhn3_D_W <- ggplot(data = Bdhn3, aes(x=Treatment, y=TPM)) + geom_boxplot(aes(fill=Treatment)) + ggtitle("Bdhn3") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
  geom_signif(test="wilcox.test", comparisons = list(c("W","D")), y_position = c(5700), map_signif_level=TRUE)


Bdhn7_D_W <- ggplot(data = Bdhn7, aes(x=Treatment, y=TPM)) + geom_boxplot(aes(fill=Treatment)) + ggtitle("Bdhn7") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
  geom_signif(test="wilcox.test", comparisons = list(c("W","D")), y_position = c(1250), map_signif_level=TRUE)


ggarrange(Bdhn1a_D_W, Bdhn2_D_W, Bdhn3_D_W, Bdhn7_D_W, ncol = 2, nrow = 2, common.legend = TRUE, legend="bottom")


dev.off()

```
